nodes.text: Nightview macrobinoculars were a model of night vision macrobinoculars designed and manufactured by Naescorcom in the final years of the Galactic Republic.

Like all macrobinoculars, the Nightview's had an internal readout system that showed information on distance and land elevation. Considering the Nightviews were specialized for enhanced nighttime viewing, the daytime resolution suffered accordingly. In terms of nightvision, though, the Nightviews were far superior to other, similar products on the market.
